Pre-Game Insights: England aim to defy critics and find rhythm in the sun against Slovenia
Conor Gallagher will replace Trent Alexander-Arnold in midfield against Slovenia
The noises from the England camp suggest that Conor Gallagher will be the one to provide an injection of energy and work ethic into the England midfield tonight.
Post-Match Reflections: Italian journalist Francesco Repice gives Modric an amazing tribute in what is likely his last match for Croatia in his career
Croatia are not yet out, as they still have slim hopes of qualifying as one of the four best third-placed teams of the six groups.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Life in the Euro 2024 fan zones: never a dull moment
